Utils¶

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.retrieve_fitapp_data(user, date_from, date_to)[source]¶
When everything goes well, the status_code is 100 and the requested data

is included. However, there are a number of things that can ‘go wrong’ with this call. For each type of error, we return an empty data list with a status_code to describe what went wrong on our end:

100:OK - Response contains JSON data.
101:User is not logged in.
102:User is not integrated with Fitbit.
103:Fitbit authentication credentials are invalid and have been removed.
104:Invalid input parameters. Either period or end_date, but not both, must be supplied. period should be one of [1d, 7d, 30d, 1w, 1m, 3m, 6m, 1y, max], and dates should be of the format ‘yyyy-mm-dd’.
105:User exceeded the Fitbit limit of 150 calls/hour.
106:Fitbit error - please try again soon.
tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.update_user_fitbit(user)[source]¶

Gets the steps from last_fitbit_sync to today, handles and stores the data in happiness/experience models #TODO: change this to be ajax suitable, so a button press can asynchronously call this method, and then get notified that update is done this method will probably take 2-3 seconds to run, since fitbit API can take a while to respond, so ajax would be good means it should go in the update_user_fitbit

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.count_pet_swaps_for_day(day)[source]¶

Returns the amount of times a user has swapped pets during a single day.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.register_user(first_name=None, last_name=None, email=None, username=None, password=None, confirm_password=None, registerForm=None)[source]¶

A new user is created based up values passed in, returns None if there is no problems, otherwise a string with the error

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.register_pet_selection(user, pet, name)[source]¶

Used for when a user picks their first pet. Creates a new current pet and assigns it to the user (and default scenery)

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.update_pet_level(collected_pet)[source]¶

Checks if a pets level should be updated, if so, perform the update.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.update_pet_level_with_value(collected_pet, experience)[source]¶

Updates a pet level with an amount of experience.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.get_pet_selection_data()[source]¶

Return all of the pet information required for the initial pet selection view.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.get_current_pet(user)[source]¶

Returns the logged in users current pet.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.set_current_pet(user, owned_pet)[source]¶

Swaps the logged in users pet with the one specified. The one specified must be owned by the user.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.set_current_scenery(collected_pet, collected_scenery)[source]¶

Swaps the logged in users scenery with the one specified. The scenery specified must be ownned by the user.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.is_item_on_bodypart(part, collected_pet)[source]¶

Returns true if an item is already on that body part or false if no objects on the body part were found.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.equip_item(collected_pet, item, part)[source]¶

Equips an item onto a pets body part. The item must be owned by the user.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.get_user(request)[source]¶
tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.is_fitbit_linked(user)[source]¶

Returns whether a user has a linked fitbit account or not

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.generate_pet_image_url(pet, image_location)[source]¶

Helper function to generate the path of a pets image.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.update_user_challenges(user)[source]¶

The update user challenges method goes through all of a users currently active challenges and checks if they have been achieved. If so, a UserNotification is generated to th user can be notified.

If user has completed a challenge they are rewarded with the pet pennies specified by the MicroChallengeGoal.

tracktivityPetsWebsite.utils.update_user_challenges(user)[source]

The update user challenges method goes through all of a users currently active challenges and checks if they have been achieved. If so, a UserNotification is generated to th user can be notified.

If user has completed a challenge they are rewarded with the pet pennies specified by the MicroChallengeGoal.
